main event: On 22 September 1964, multiple witnesses, including pilots and civilians, reported observing unidentified flying objects in the vicinity of Stead AFB, Nevada, and surrounding areas.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be moving at high speeds of 3500-4000 mph., One object was observed to be round and bright, appearing like a pinhead in size., A pilot believed one object was initially a satellite or missile but determined it was not., Witnesses described the objects as having a glowing appearance with a straight vapor trail like a shining star., There were also reports of the objects disappearing gradually after a few minutes of observation.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects (UFOs), described as round and glowing
witness description: Pilots and civilians including Mr. Carmichael and civilian eyewitnesses from Carmichael and West Sacramento, California
